articles.content: The state is one of 16 to get word that it no longer meets that definition based on several factors, including an improving labor participation rate, a measure of the population working or looking fo… [+2774 chars]

articles.author: Brian Orelli, PhD
articles.title: WHO Recommends Against Using Gilead's Remdesivir for COVID-19 - The Motley Fool
articles.description: The agency concluded there's no evidence that the drug improves survival or positively impacts other outcomes.
articles.content:
The controversy over Gilead Sciences' (NASDAQ:GILD) remdesivir continues.
A month ago, the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) approved the drug, which goes by the trade name Veklury, to treat COVID-… [+1813 chars]
